member.name: DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE
member.summary: Indicates the file format of a complete font face.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE.DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE_CFF
member.summary: OpenType font face with CFF outlines.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE.DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE_TRUETYPE
member.summary: OpenType font face with TrueType outlines.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE.DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Font face type is not recognized by the DirectWrite font system.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE.DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE_RAW_CFF
member.summary: The font data includes only the CFF table from an OpenType CFF font. This font face type can be used only for embedded fonts (i.e., custom font file loaders) and the resulting font face object supports only the minimum functionality necessary to render glyphs.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE.DWRITE_FONT_FACE_TYPE_TRUETYPE_COLLECTION
member.summary: OpenType font face that is a part of a TrueType collection.
